column1: Good to know, but it sounds like the Coronavirus is getting away from them!! I heard there will be a vaccine for it in 2-3 months! What do people do in the meantime?!?! https://twitter.com/sheila06942158/status/1221211974316560385 …

I believe I know what happened here. The owners of the patent we’re using an inert, safe version of the Coronavirus as a vector to attack other deadly viruses. What they didn’t consider perhaps, was what happens if it mutates? I believe that’s exactly what happened, they have....
